doc.title: First paint

value.content: First Paint, part of the Paint Timing API, is the time between navigation and when the browser renders the first pixels to the screen, rendering anything that is visually different from the default background color of the body. It answers the question "Is it happening?"

value.title: See also
value.content:
• First contentful paint
  • Paint Timing API
  • Largest Contentful API
  • First meaningful paint
